title: The Crown Prince’s Fiancée - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manhwa   Ancient Times   Aristocracy   Beautiful Female Lead   Cold Love Interests   Empires   European Ambience   Female Protagonist   Forced Living Arrangements   Handsome Male Lead   Kingdoms   Maids   Nobles   Royalty
author: Lee Heen   Yunsul   윤슬
description:
A secret that I, a maid of the imperial palace, accidentally heard… that the runaway fiancée of the prince was actually a man?!

'Please spare my life! I'll do anything!'
'Anything?'

As I desperately nodded my head, the prince gave a chilling smile. There's only one way to not get silenced permanently!

'Then I choose you.'
'For what?'
'To be my fiancée.'

To become the fiancée (replacement) of the prince.>
